SelectDeviceText: Seems like one or more devices have already been added to this account. [CR][CR]If you want to add this device to your account - add it. [CR][CR]If it is an already added device - just select it from the list
SubscribedLifetime: You have successfully subscribed to Premium for your lifetime
SubscribedMonths: You have successfully subscribed to Premium for {0} months
SubscribedMonth: You have successfully subscribed to Premium for 1 month
AddonForTvNotFound: You are missing an addon to play this
AddonForTvNotActivated: An addon is not activated to play this
